text1: A faction cut off from the rest of their nation due to unfortante circumstance, the senior leadership decided to consolidated power into a new command council and continue the traditions of the USN as their own entity or if one day they can be reunited.

Twin 50cal AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in one 105 round belt at a time while holding 210 rounds in reserve total.
Oerlikon 20mm AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in one 60 drum at a time.
Oerlikon 20mm AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in one 60 drum at a time while holding 120 rounds in reserve total.
Bofor 40mm AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in one round at a time while holding 4 rounds in reserve total.
Dual Bofor 40mm AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in 2 rounds at a time while holding 8 rounds in reserve total.
Quad Bofor 40mm AA Mount, you might see this for many built-in weapons. The loading mechanism has been automated, it feeds in 4 round at a time while holding 16 rounds in reserve total.
5 inch (127mm) Gun turret. The loading mechanism has been semi-automated, it feeds in one round at a time while holding 5 rounds in reserve total.
5 inch (127mm) Gun turret, this one is loaded with Flak shells. The loading mechanism has been semi-automated, it feeds in one round at a time while holding 5 rounds in reserve total.

Quad 16 inch (405mm) Gun turret. The loading mechanism has been semi-automated, it feeds in 4 rounds at a time while holding 24 rounds in reserve total.
